page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW: POYNTINGTON
page.content:
This is a sparsely populated block of beautiful open{farmland landscapes lying between the nearby{Somerset {villages}of Corton Denham,Charlton Horethorne and Milborne Port but including the Dorset village of Poyntington. Milborne Wick hamlet is in the S.E. corner by the main line to London. Residents,other than farmers and retired folk,mainly in Poyntington commute the short journey to nearby towns for work,leisure,education and shopping. A strong community spirit exists both in Poyntington and the respective adjacent villages, summarised as follows:
ARTS and CRAFTS,CLUBS and GROUPS, ECOLOGY,EMPLOYMENT,EVENTS,FARMING,FARM HUSBANDRY,GOVERNMENT,HOME LIFE, HOUSING,LANGUAGE,LOCAL HISTORY,MEDIA, RECREATION,TRANSPORT,POPULATION.
